snippet.title: Sword Art Online: Fatal Bullet - Features and Story Trailer | PS4, XB1, PC
snippet.description:
In Sword Art Online: Fatal Bullet, friends and allies will help you along your journey. As you take control of your fate, build your relationship with your ArFA-sys who will support you while you take on the digital world! From setting their behavioral systems and appearances to banking, your ArFA-sys will be a crucial ally in your story.  Plus, new and old friends like Lisbeth, Agil, and Asuna will aid you in your adventure with new weapons and outfits.  

Sword Art Online: Fatal Bullet will arrive on February 23, 2018 for PS4, XB1, and PC. 

Preorder: http://bit.ly/2iuS1hp 

Follow Bandai Namco Entertainment: 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bandainamcous/?hl=en
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BandaiNamcoUS
Twitter: https://twitter.com/BandaiNamcoUS/
Tumblr: http://bandainamcous.tumblr.com/
Twitch: http://www.twitch.tv/bandainamcous
